titleStmt.title: An abstract of the doctrine of the sabbaoth Briefly, yet fully and plainely set forth; together with the vses of the same doctrine; with the vsuall obiections and answers therevnto. All which for the helpe of memorie, are drawne into sundry chapters.
titleStmt.author: Burton, William, d. 1616.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by V. S[immes]. for Nicholas Ling,

notesStmt.note: The dedication is signed: W. Burton.
Caption title on p. 1: Of the manner and matter of the fourth commaundement in generall.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
